fields.name: Engineering
fields.description: Plans, builds, and maintains roads, bridges, and public buildings.

fields.name: Public Health
fields.description: Oversees sanitation, health programs, and disease control.

fields.title: Chief Administrative Officer
fields.description: Leads overall operations, supervises staff, ensures implementation of council decisions.

fields.title: Administrative Officer
fields.description: Manages records, correspondence, and day-to-day office functions.

fields.title: Finance Officer
fields.description: Prepares budgets, oversees revenue collection, and financial reporting.

fields.title: Accountant
fields.description: Maintains accounts, handles payments, and assists in audits.

fields.name: Municipality
fields.description: A municipality is a local government unit that manages a specific area such as a town or city. It provides public services, maintains infrastructure, enforces local laws, and collects taxes. It is governed by elected officials like a mayor and council.
